# Nokia 7750 SR OS LAG Configuration

configure
    lag 1
        description "Core LAG to Aggregation Switch"
        admin-state enable
        mode lacp
        lacp-xmit-interval fast
        port 1/1/5
        port 1/1/6
        encap-type dot1q
    exit
    lag 2
        description "LAG to Customer CPE"
        admin-state enable
        mode lacp
        port 1/1/7
        port 1/1/8
        encap-type dot1q
    exit
    port 1/1/5
        admin-state enable
        description "LAG-1 Member Port 1"
        ethernet
            mode network
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/6
        admin-state enable
        description "LAG-1 Member Port 2"
        ethernet
            mode network
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/7
        admin-state enable
        description "LAG-2 Member Port 1"
        ethernet
            mode access
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/8
        admin-state enable
        description "LAG-2 Member Port 2"
        ethernet
            mode access
        exit
    exit
exit
